value.title: NeuralCam Live uses ML to turn iPhones into ‘smart’ computer webcams

value.title: Google’s Lookout app for vision-impaired now scans food labels and long documents
value.excerpt: Google has updated its Lookout app, an AI toolkit for people with impaired vision, with two helpful new capabilities: scanning long documents and reading out food labels. Paper forms and similarly-shaped products at the store present a challenge for blind folks and this ought to make things easier.
